data_table.description: Form 40 - Addendum to Medical History Update -- family history of DVT and PE. (2002)

variable.name: F40VY
variable.comment: Visit year in which this form was collected.

variable.name: FAMILYDVTEVR
variable.description: F40 Family member ever have deep vein thrombosis (DVT)
variable.comment: Did your mother, father, full-blooded sisters, full-blooded brothers, daughters, or sons ever have deep vein thrombosis or DVT (large blood clot in the veins of legs)?

variable.name: FAMILYDVTNUM
variable.description: F40 How many relatives had deep vein thrombosis (DVT)
variable.comment: How many of these relatives (mother, father, full-blooded sisters, full-blooded brothers, daughters, or sons) had deep vein thrombosis? Sub-question of F40 V1 Q1 'Family member ever have DVT'.

variable.name: FAMILYPEEVR
variable.description: F40 Family member ever have a pulmonary embolus (PE)
variable.comment: Did your mother, father, full-blooded sisters, full-blooded brothers, daughters, or sons ever have a blood clot in the lung, usually called a pulmonary embolus or PE?

variable.name: FAMILYPENUM
variable.description: F40 How many relatives had a blood clot in the lungs (PE)
variable.comment: How many of these relatives (mother, father, full-blooded sisters, full-blooded brothers, daughters, or sons) had a blood clot in the lungs? Sub-question of F40 V1 Q2 'Family member ever have a PE'.
